metadata.description: Classic Sword and Sorcery action! An all new series reprinting classic Red Sonja tales! First up is an incredible story ("The Ring of Ikribu" from Savage Sword of Conan) by the legendary Roy Thomas, joined by artist Esteban Maroto! Featuring a new cover image by the legendary Frank Brunner! Remastered in color for the first time ever!
metadata.name: Classic Red Sonja Remastered
